About Bolt Productions

Who We Are

Our Vision

Bolt Productions is a gaming and esports-oriented events management & production company providing end-to-end service/solutions customisable to your needs/based on your requirements.are a team of experienced & passionate professionals with proven ability be it planning and executing small to large scale esports production, providing consultancy on targeted esports events & technical/ad-hoc support.

To be your trusted one-stop Esports & gaming service provider that delivers top-notch livestreaming events to leverage and engage the right target segment among youths within the gaming community.

Inspiring Keynotes

Our gaming events have had a wide array of amazing guests and speakers

Reinventing Experiences

We are dedicated to creating new and unique gaming experiences that delight and amaze our clients and their customers

Learning Sessions

>We can provide facilities to allow attendees to learn about the latest tech in gaming development
